name: Hypno

abilities.name: Prophecy
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at up to 3 cards from the top of either player's deck and rearrange them as you like.

attacks.name: Dark Mind
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of psi moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion.

strengths: Prophecy allows deck manipulation for both players
90 HP is solid for a Stage 1
Dark Mind spreads damage to bench
Can set up bad draws for opponent
synergies: Cards that care about top of deck
Gengar (shared Dark Mind attack and spread strategy)
Lass (arrange bad draws after they reshuffle)
counters: Aggressive decks that don't care about deck order

competitiveHistory: This non-holo version of Hypno is functionally identical to the holo version (#8). Hypno's unique Prophecy power allowed for deck manipulation of either player. The non-holo printing made this utility card more accessible.

rulings.ruling: Prophecy lets you look at UP TO 3 cards - you can choose to look at fewer.
You must choose which player's deck to look at before looking at the cards.
After rearranging, the cards go back on top of the deck in your chosen order - you don't shuffle.
Dark Mind's bench damage does not apply Weakness or Resistance.
